scripts.build: cd client && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.git:push: node -e "const readline=require('readline');const rl=readline.createInterface({input:process.stdin,output:process.stdout});rl.question('Enter commit message: ',msg=>{if(!msg.trim()){console.error('Error: Commit message required!');process.exit(1);}const{execSync}=require('child_process');try{execSync('git add .',{stdio:'inherit'});execSync(`git commit -m "${msg}"`,{stdio:'inherit'});const branch=execSync('git branch --show-current',{encoding:'utf8'}).trim();execSync(`git push origin ${branch}`,{stdio:'inherit'});console.log('Successfully pushed!');}catch(e){console.error('Error:',e.message);process.exit(1);}rl.close();});"
